vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.8;
son of: Koz (H6976);
brother of: Zobebah (H6637) and Harum (H2037)
§ Anub = "confederate"
son of Coz, descendant of Judah and Caleb through Ashur, the father of Tekoa
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Cos; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞諾 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "同盟者"
哥斯之子, 猶大和迦勒的子孫, 屬提哥亞之父亞施戶一脈 #代上 4:8|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚诺 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "同盟者"
哥斯之子, 犹大和迦勒的子孙, 属提哥亚之父亚施户一脉 #代上 4:8|
